#Problem 1

**Reading** and **cleaning** the data

```{r Read_clean_data}
nyc_transit =
  read_csv(file = "./data/NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(line, station_name:entry,vending, ada) %>% 
  mutate(entry = recode(entry,"YES" = TRUE, "NO" = FALSE))
  

```
